import './Weather.css' const Weather = (props) => { if (props.loading) return

loading

let temp, icon, description, humidity, speed let i = props.type - 1 if (props.type === 0) { temp = props.data.temp icon = props.data.weather[0].icon description = props.data.weather[0].description humidity = props.data.humidity speed = props.data.wind_speed } else { temp = props.data[i].temp.day icon = props.data[i].weather[0].icon description = props.data[i].weather[0].description humidity = props.data[i].humidity speed = props.data[i].wind_speed } const days = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"] ; const curDay = new Date().getDay(); return (

{days[(curDay-1+props.type)%7]}

{`${temp}Â°C`}

{description}
{`Humidity: ${humidity}%`}
{`Wind speed: ${speed} km/h`}
) } export default Weather
